statements: SELECT * FROM transaction_data;
SELECT customer_name, customer_location, amount FROM demographic_information WHERE customer_age > 30;
SELECT transaction_date, amount FROM transaction_data WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_gender FROM demographic_information WHERE customer_location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM transaction_data ORDER BY transaction_date DESC, amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_data WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT customer_name, customer_age FROM demographic_information WHERE customer_age BETWEEN 25 AND 35
SELECT customer_name, customer_gender, transaction_date FROM demographic_information JOIN transaction_data ON demographic_information.customer_id = transaction_data.customer_id
SELECT customer_name, customer_location FROM demographic_information WHERE customer_location LIKE '%New York%'
SELECT SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transaction_data GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_amount > 500
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT customer_id, amount FROM transactions ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT customer_name, age, gender FROM demographics;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, customer_id FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, age, gender FROM demographics WHERE age >= 18 AND gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE customer_id = 101 ORDER BY transaction_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, age FROM demographics WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.amount, d.customer_name, d.age FROM transactions t JOIN demographics d ON t.customer_id = d.customer_id ORDER BY t.amount DESC, d.age ASC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_data;
SELECT customer_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transaction_data ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM demographic_information WHERE age > 30;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM targeted_marketing_campaigns WHERE end_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, gender FROM demographic_information WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM transaction_data ORDER BY transaction_date DESC, amount ASC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transaction_data GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_amount > 1000;
SELECT t.customer_id, d.first_name, d.last_name, d.age, t.transaction_date FROM transaction_data t JOIN demographic_information d ON t.customer_id = d.customer_id;

SELECT t.customer_id, d.gender, c.campaign_name FROM transaction_data t JOIN demographic_information d ON t.customer_id = d.customer_id JOIN targeted_marketing_campaigns c ON t.customer_id = c.campaign_id;
SELECT d.first_name, d.last_name, TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, d.age, CURDATE()) AS years_old FROM demographic_information d;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT customer_name, age FROM customers ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_amount > 1000;
SELECT t.transaction_id, c.campaign_name FROM transactions t JOIN campaign_transactions ct ON t.transaction_id = ct.transaction_id JOIN campaigns c ON ct.campaign_id = c.campaign_id;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT customer_name, age FROM customers ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT t.transaction_id, c.customer_name, t.amount FROM transactions t JOIN customers c ON t.customer_id = c.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, gender, COUNT(t.transaction_id) AS total_transactions FROM customers c LEFT JOIN transactions t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name, gender;
SELECT * FROM TransactionData
SELECT customer_name, age, gender FROM DemographicData
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM MarketingCampaign
SELECT customer_id, amount FROM TransactionData WHERE amount > 100
SELECT result_id, conversion_rate, revenue FROM CampaignResults
SELECT * FROM TransactionData ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, age, gender FROM DemographicData WHERE age > 30
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM MarketingCampaign WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY end_date
SELECT target_id, conversion_rate, revenue FROM CampaignResults WHERE conversion_rate > 0.5
SELECT TRUNCATE(amount, 2) FROM TransactionData WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
